trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> has a StylusPointCollection that contains <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects collected from a stylus and digitizer.

trans-unit.source: You can use the StylusPointCollection to customize the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>。</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>をカスタマイズするのに、StylusPointCollection を使用することができます。

trans-unit.source: `subsetToReformatTo` is a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> which describes a subset of values belonging to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: `subsetToReformatTo`<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>に属している値のサブセットについて説明しますが、<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A>プロパティ</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A></xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.GetCommonDescription%2A> method to get a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> that intersects the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A> of the current <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.GetCommonDescription%2A><xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription><xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A>現在<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>。</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>の</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A>交差を</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>取得するメソッド</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.GetCommonDescription%2A>を使用します。

trans-unit.source: The Reformat method returns a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> that contains the same <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects as those belonging to the current <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 再フォーマット メソッドでは、<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>同じ<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>オブジェクトを現在<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>。</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>に属するものとして</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>含まれる</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>を返します

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects in the new <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> uses `subsetToReformatTo` as the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>、新しいオブジェクト<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>使用`subsetToReformatTo` <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription></xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> 。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Reformat uses the constraints from the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A> property, even if the constraints in `subsetToReformatTo` are different.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 再フォーマットから制約を使用して、<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo>の<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A>場合でも、プロパティ内の制約`subsetToReformatTo`が異なります</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A></xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo>。

trans-unit.source: For example, if `subsetToReformatTo` uses the values 0 and 1023 for <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure> whereas <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A> uses the values 0 and 255.
trans-unit.target: たとえば場合、`subsetToReformatTo`値 0 および 1023: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure>一方<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A>は 0 から 255 までの値を使用します</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A></xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure>。

trans-unit.source: Reformat returns a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> using the values, 0 and 255.
trans-unit.target: 返しますを再フォーマット、 <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>、値を使用して 0 から 255 まで</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> to intersect with the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref>と交差する、 <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> 、現在の<xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref>です。
